name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in designing and implementing robust APIs and authentication/authorization strategies. I excel in ensuring safety compliance and scalability while managing event flows, background jobs, and technical architecture. My technical strategy is fortified by hands-on experience with **Ruby on Rails** and implementing webhooks, along with caching mechanisms and schema evolution practices.

I have a proven track record in fostering collaboration through tools like **Slack** and **Microsoft Teams**, conducting code reviews, and providing mentorship to junior developers. I am adept in observability techniques to ensure system reliability and security across applications. My expertise extends to utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, while leveraging modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. Additionally, I possess deep cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS** and have a strong foundation in CI/CD automation and microservices architecture. I have led projects integrating AI/ML capabilities for dynamic and predictive analytics, successfully deploying machine learning pipelines using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
